```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

# Code from the class site
```{r}
weather_df = 
  rnoaa::meteo_pull_monitors(
    c("USW00094728", "USC00519397", "USS0023B17S"),
    var = c("PRCP", "TMIN", "TMAX"), 
    date_min = "2017-01-01",
    date_max = "2017-12-31") %>%
  mutate(
    name = recode(
      id, 
      USW00094728 = "CentralPark_NY", 
      USC00519397 = "Waikiki_HA",
      USS0023B17S = "Waterhole_WA"),
    tmin = tmin / 10,
    tmax = tmax / 10,
    month = lubridate::floor_date(date, unit = "month")) %>%
select(name, id, everything())
weather_df
```


## group_by()
```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  group_by(name, month)
```

## Summarzied 
```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  group_by(name, month) %>% 
  summarize(
    n_obs = n()
  )
```

## count in the other ways?
```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  count(name, month)
```

#Don't use "table()"
```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  pull(month) %>% 
  table()
```

# you can have multiple summaries
```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  group_by(month) %>% 
  summarize(
    n_obs= n(),
    n_dist= n_distinct(date)
  )
```

# a brief aside on 2*2 tables
```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  mutate(
    cold = case_when(
      tmax <  5 ~ "cold",
      tmax >= 5 ~ "not_cold",
      TRUE      ~ ""
  )) %>% 
  filter(name != "Waikiki_HA") %>% 
  group_by(name, cold) %>% 
  summarize(n_obs= n()) %>% 
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = cold,
    values_from = n_obs
  )
```

```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  mutate(
    cold = case_when(
      tmax <  5 ~ "cold",
      tmax >= 5 ~ "not_cold",
      TRUE      ~ "THIS IS S PROBLEM"
  )) %>% 
  filter(name != "Waikiki_HA") %>% 
  janitor::tabyl(name,cold)
```
